homePage.heroTitle: Navigate the Future of Web3 Rewards
homePage.heroSubtitle: A singular platform designed for the discerning enthusiast. Discover, manage, and claim the most promising airdrops with unparalleled efficiency and insight.
homePage.featuresSubtitle: Core features designed to elevate your airdrop strategy from hobby to mastery.
homePage.feature1Description: Discover and participate in airdrops from the most promising Web3 projects, vetted for potential.
homePage.feature2Description: Effortlessly track all your airdrop progress and tasks in one centralized, intuitive dashboard.
homePage.feature3Description: Join a community of forward-thinkers. Discuss strategies and get the latest alpha on upcoming drops.
homePage.feature4Description: Gain access to exclusive token giveaways and community events, reserved for our members.
homePage.joinCtaTitle: Your Gateway to the Decentralized Frontier
homePage.joinCtaSubtitle: The future of value is here. Create your account and begin your journey with AFA Web3Tool.

eventsPage.title: Special Events & Giveaways
eventsPage.subtitle: Join exclusive events for AFA community members and win exciting prizes!

afaIdentityPage.title: Claim Your AFA Identity
afaIdentityPage.subtitle: Mint a unique NFT that represents your identity in the AFA Web3Tool ecosystem.
afaIdentityPage.description: By holding the AFA Identity NFT, you gain access to exclusive features, special community roles, and potential future rewards. This is your passport to the Web3 world with AFA.
